</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

The ghastly visage of a slain [medusa's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=297) head stares out from this [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 13, HP 52, BT 26). The shield comes with a thick leather cover to conceal the head.

<document level="2" id="action-585" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the head of a [medusa](/Monsters.aspx?ID=297).

A _greater medusa's scream_ (Hardness 15, HP 60, BT 30) has a frequency of once per hour for its activation instead of once per day, and the DC is 35.
